name: BITKART : Empowering Campus E-commerce
desc: Developed BITKART, a secure MERN stack website for campus second-hand item sales, featuring JWT authentication, MongoDB, Multer for image uploads, and RESTful routes with CORS middleware.

name: Tic-Toe Thrive: Multiplayer Madness
desc: Implemented real-time multiplayer functionality with Socket.io and developed a scalable backend using Node.js and Express.js for game logic, dynamic player matchmaking, and game room creation.
